ygData.subject: RE: Tracking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They really need to add an optional range limiter to tracking. Sometimes I m pulling random stuff and just want what s closest, sometimes I m looking for a
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 11 Nov 1999, David Knadler wrote:
> >
> > My track capped out at 100 i believe. and i find it very very useful.
> > especially in Solb when there are 40 - 50 people there. I can
> > find that dog
> > that just spawned before other people. :)
>
> I've heard that bard tracking is probably the best in the game. Rangers
> tracking is way too far, and druid tracking isn't far enough.

They really need to add an optional range limiter to tracking.
Sometimes I'm pulling random stuff and just want what's
closest, sometimes I'm looking for a rare mob and don't mind
wandering the entire zone looking for it. Our tracking, being
in the middle, is a good compromise, but I wouldn't call it
the "best." There are many situations where a ranger is
better, and there are many situations where a druid is
better.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
